DOC.brief_title: Food Frequency Questionnaires Estimating Food Nutrient Intake Healthy Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To examine relationship estimate intake dietary carotenoid use three different FFQ 's comparing estimate carotenoid intake 3 day diet record blood skin measurement . OUTLINE : Participants complete Willett FFQ , Fred Hutchinson FFQ , newly develop Clinton Carotenoid Assessment Tool ( CCAT ) , random order 3 4-month period time 4-6 week visit . Prior visit , participant also complete 3-day diet record , daily sun exposure diary , 3-day activity record . Blood sample collect plasma carotenoid assessment skin carotenoid content assess use resonance Raman spectroscopy .
DOC.criteria: Be literate able understand English Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 kg/m^2 ; represent low end healthy BMI range upper limit overweight BMI range target age range Be nonsmoker ( define adult never smoke cigarette past ten year ) Not currently take vitamin , mineral , dietary supplement ( agree discontinue use duration study ) agree consume standardized daily multivitamin remainder study ( CVS One Daily ) Voluntarily agree participate sign inform consent document Agree three separate blood draw Agree three separate spectroscopy scan assess skin carotenoid level Agree complete three separate 3day diet record , three separate 3day activity record , one habitual physical activity questionnaire Have active metabolic digestive illness , include malabsorptive disorder , renal insufficiency , hepatic insufficiency , hyper hypothyroidism , cachexia , morbid obesity , short bowel syndrome Have active recent history condition cause altered immunity , chronic inflammatory disease , autoimmune disorder , cancer , anemia , blood dyscrasia Are heavy alcohol consumer ( define average consumption great 2 drinks/day )
